title: Dr Zeus Threatens To Sue Badshah For Using His Song 'Don't Be Shy' In 'Bala' Without Permission
text:
Dr Zeus Threatens To Sue Badshah For Using His Song 'Don't Be Shy' In 'Bala' Without Permission

Dr Zeus Threatens To Sue Badshah For Using His Song 'Don't Be Shy' In 'Bala' Without Permission

There is no dearth of drama in the film industry and there are new updates everyday. The latest one has popped up between Dr. Zeus and Rapper Badshah.

Makers of Ayushmann Khurrana starrer 'Bala' dropped their first single 'Don't Be Shy' from the film, which is a recreated version of a song by Rouge and Dr Zeus with the same name.

The reprised version that has been unveiled features Ayushmann Khurrana in a bald avatar and it also shows his struggle of hiding his bald-patch with a wig.

Don't Miss 634 SHARES 2.6 K SHARES 25.5 K SHARES 3.8 K SHARES

The reprised version of the song has been composed by the famous duo, Sachin-Jigar and the song has been sung by Shalmali Kholgade and Badshah.

As soon as the video was dropped, the original composer of the song, Dr Zeus took to his Twitter to make his point heard.

He tweeted, "Are u guys taking the piss @sonymusicindia @MaddockFilms @Its_Badshah @SonyMusicUK @SachinJigarLive wen did u compose don’t b shy & kangna.. more to the point how dare u guys b riding off ma old hits & fuckin them up??? Ya need to get original🖕🏽My lawyers will b in touch🖕🏽"

Are u guys taking the piss @sonymusicindia @MaddockFilms @Its_Badshah @SonyMusicUK @SachinJigarLive wen did u compose don’t b shy & kangna.. more to the point how dare u guys b riding off ma old hits & fuckin them up??? Ya need to get original🖕🏽My lawyers will b in touch🖕🏽 — Dr Zeus (@drzeusworld) October 18, 2019

Right after these comments, Badshah too released a statement. He added that he immensely respects Dr. Zeus and he will clear the misunderstanding if there is any.

I am aware of the situation around ‘Dont be shy’. I want to start by saying that i love And respect @drzeusworld paaji immensely and he knows it. He has the right to get angry with me because he’s my senior and ive learnt a lot from him. And he is the last person id want (contd) — BADSHAH (@Its_Badshah) October 18, 2019

to go through something like this. I got on the song, which has been recreated by my dear friends Sachin Jigar, only after making sure we had the necessary rights. But still if there’s any misunderstanding, ill make sure it gets cleared asap. I support Zeus Paaji.

Badshah — BADSHAH (@Its_Badshah) October 18, 2019

Directed by Amar Kaushik, the film also stars Bhumi Pednekar and Yami Gautam and will hit the theaters on November 07.
